title: The Wrong Bed
description: Louise is a secretary in a law firm and she always has a hard time saying no. When her kinda boyfriend Ben invites her to 'The Hamptons' for the weekend to meet his family she hesitantly accepts.And then she meets his brother David and she starts to feel excited about the weekend and what might happen. But then she meets his other brother Richard and Louise has never hated anyone soo quickly before.When Louise decide's to have some fun, she realizes that she has climbed into the wrong bed.'The Wrong Bed' is the first book in 'The Millionaire's Games' series. It is an erotic romance with very sexy scenes. If you like hot spicy romances you will enjoy this hot story.Readers should be 18 PLUS to read this short story.
author: Helen    Cooper
